items.sentence: I felt Tom's forehead to see if he had a fever.
I had to call Tom to get permission to do that.
I have a daughter that goes to school with Tom.
I told Tom he shouldn't stay out late at night.
Tom and I've been friends for a very long time.
Tom doesn't get along well with his stepfather.
Tom doesn't want Mary to know where he's going.
The clothes Tom has on don't fit him very well.
The police found Tom hiding in Mary's basement.
This is the hospital where Tom and I were born.
